name: Studio Brundal
intro: Studio Brundal is founded by Lilian van Daal and Ralf de Bruin. By combining their qualities they are able to create designs that are perfectly tailored to every request a client might have. They create meaningful design solutions and experiences for brands and audiences.
content_1:
A new product starts with a thought. An idea that either builds on an existing item or an idea that has no form yet.

Being able to shape a thought, an idea and materialize it into reality is one of the strong points of Studio Brundal.
content_2: The work they show at the DDW depicts this process. An object that creates a 3d illusion by means of printed transparent foil layers. An image that adapts to the viewer's position. Which symbolizes the individuality of a brand or customer.
